title: Business Type
description: What type of business do you operate?

title: Target Audience
label: Describe your target audience:
placeholder: e.g., Small business owners, HR managers, etc.

title: Sales Material Challenges
description: What challenges do you currently face with sales materials?

title: Key Messages
description: What key messages do you want to convey to prospects?

title: Generate Your Sales Material Template Guide
description: Get a customized guide with step-by-step instructions for creating effective sales materials tailored to your business.
